body_html: @wolffg, I would be concerned about having divergent copies of the same tutorials. Has there been any progress on what we discussed a few months ago about being able to download a jupyter notebook from any tutorial page (i.e. a dynamically concerted notebook form of any doc page). That would be nice, and it wouldn't have a possibility of out of sync. It would also allow us to unit test our tutorials easily to make sure they didn't get stale.

body: @wolffg, I would be concerned about having divergent copies of the same tutorials. Has there been any progress on what we discussed a few months ago about being able to download a jupyter notebook from any tutorial page (i.e. a dynamically concerted notebook form of any doc page). That would be nice, and it wouldn't have a possibility of out of sync. It would also allow us to unit test our tutorials easily to make sure they didn't get stale.
